sentences.sContent: I left my bag of film on the  ferry.
sentences.sContent_eng: I left my bag of film on the ferry.
sentences.sCn: 我把装底片的旅行袋遗放在渡船上.

sentences.sContent: The ferry service of bygone days has been replaced by that tunnel.
sentences.sContent_eng: The ferry service of bygone days has been replaced by that tunnel.
sentences.sCn: 往日的渡口已被那个隧道取代。

sentences.sContent: It is windy today,so it would be difficult to put the ferry boat across.
sentences.sContent_eng: It is windy today,so it would be difficult to put the ferry boat across.
sentences.sCn: 今天刮风，要摆渡到对岸不容易。

synos.tran: （乘渡船）渡过；用渡船运送；空运

phrases.pCn: 渡轮码头；车船联运港；客轮码头

words.tran: （用船、木筏等）渡运（人、物、汽车等）；渡运飞机；摆渡（ferry的ing形式）

remMethod.val: fer(带来， 拿来) ＋ ry → 渡运

trans.tranOther: a boat that carries people or goods across a river or a narrow area of water
